definition: Kunlun Mountain range
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
variant of 崑|昆[kun1]
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
Kunlun (Karakorum) mountain range in Xinjiang
to arrange
variant of 崙|仑[lun2]
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Kunlun Mountain range
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
pinyin: Ka1 la3 kun1 lun2 Shan1 mai4

definition: Karakorum mountains

sentences.english: Akazi pluton, which occurs in Western Kunlun in north of Qinghai-Tibet plateau, is the known oldest pluton in this area.
sentences.chinese: 西昆仑山阿卡孜岩体是该区已知的最古老侵入体。

sentences.english: This essay argues that the name originated from the Wa people, and Goligong is the very Kunlun Mountain in history.
sentences.chinese: 同时认为，高黎贡山就是我国历史上所说的昆仑山。

sentences.english: The Huang-yang-lin antimony deposit is newly discovered and is located in the hinterland of the Xinjiang Kunlun Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 黄羊岭锑矿床是新疆昆仑山腹地新发现的锑矿产地。

sentences.english: Keriya River is located in south Xinjiang, China.
sentences.chinese: 克里雅河发源于昆仑山脉，位置在新疆的南部。

sentences.english: The Sugaite structural belt in west Xinjiang was located at the front of arcuate nappe outliers of the Kunlun Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 苏盖特构造带位于新疆昆仑山弧形推覆体前缘。

sentences.english: He's believed to live in the Bright Place of Kunlun Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 据传他住在昆仑山光明顶。

sentences.english: The K2 peak is situated on the Pak-China border in the mighty Karakoram range.
sentences.chinese: 乔戈里顶峰处于雄伟的喀喇昆仑山脉的中巴边境上。

sentences.english: From the boundless expanse of the east coast to the mountains of Kunlun Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 从浩瀚无垠的东海之滨到巍峨的昆仑山下。

sentences.english: Kunlun Mountains angel came to earth.
sentences.chinese: 昆仑山的天女来到了人间。

sentences.english: Coming from the ivory comb _insert_ed alone, the Kunlun mountains next month.
sentences.chinese: 独把象牙梳插鬓，昆仑山上月初明。

sentences.english: Several sections were set up to observe the air temperature and ground temperature in Kunlunshan tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 在昆仑山隧道洞内设置了地温及气温观测断面。

definition: Kunlun Mountain range
mountain of Immortals
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母

Buzhou Mountain, a mountain from Chinese legend
Xingxiuhai, high plateau in Qinhai close to the source of the Yellow River
"heavenly lake", lake situated on a mountain/used as the name of numerous lakes, such as 長白山天池|长白山天池[Chang2 bai2 shan1 Tian1 chi2]
Lake Tianchi in Xinjiang
Xi Wangmu, Queen Mother of the West, keeper of the peaches of immortality/popularly known as 王母娘娘
Yin mountains in Inner Mongolia
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
Zhongnan Mountains, near Xi'an/also known as the Taiyi Mountains
Mt Emei in Sichuan, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Samantabhadra 普賢|普贤

island of the immortals
